title: UP 2 BEDROOM-Unit #3 Heart of Gordon Square!
posting_body: Nestled in the heart of Gordon Square/Detroit Shoreway district!
Great location to walk or bike to Ohio City, Hingetown and Cuyahoga Valley's towpath and Edgewater Park on Lake Erie!
2 miles from downtown and ample public transportation.
5 miles from Cleveland Clinic Main Campus and University Circle.
Enjoy plenty of great local restaurants, pubs and breweries.

1300sqft, Unfurnished, 2 bedrooms with ceiling fans and generous sized closets, 1 bath with tiled floor and shower/tub, kitchen with tile floor, granite counters, brand new stainless steel appliances, garbage disposal, dishwasher, refrigerator has ice/water, microwave, electric stove, bar/island area, dining area, family room with aesthetic fireplace, A/C, ensuite washer and dryer, ONE off street parking spot, outside private porch with lake peep views, wired with full alarm system.
1 year lease $1350/mo + $1350 deposit due to hold unit immediately.
Tenant pays gas electric and cable.
Please REPLY to this post for a showing.
